fees.description: Disconnection fee may apply when vacating your property and disconnecting electricity to your property (or reading your meter where applicable). Fees may vary and see additional fee information for more details.

Reconnection fee may apply when moving into your property and connecting electricity to your property (or reading your meter where applicable). Fees may vary and see additional fee information for details.

Connection fee may apply when moving into your property and connecting electricity to your property (or reading your meter where applicable). Fees may vary and see additional fee information for details.
Credit card merchant service fee of 0.36% for all payments with Visa or Mastercard.
Credit card merchant service fee of 1.5% for all payments with American Express.
$12.00 (GST does not currently apply to late payment fees).
Incl. GST effective from 6 April 2020. Refer to www.energyaustralia.com.au/home/help-and-support/faqs/paper-bill-fee for details.

electricityContract.terms: Please refer to our website www.energyaustralia.com.au for full terms and conditions.
electricityContract.variation: Prices may be varied in line with your terms and conditions. We will give you notice before any new prices take effect.

incentives.description: You may be eligible for our PowerResponse program, and by participating in events, you may be eligible for rebates which may change over time. See website energyaustralia.com.au/power-response for details on eligibility criteria, T&C's and rebates.

eligibility.description: Offer only available through selected partner channels.

solarFeedInTariff.description: EnergyAustralia Retailer Feed-in Tariff (excl. GST if any)

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: Your market contract is ongoing. Your contract will continue until it is ended by either party.
electricityContract.additionalFeeInformation: Additional fees and charges may apply. Please refer to www.energyaustralia.com.au/conditions-and-pricing/other-charges. You can avoid the payment processing fees by paying from your bank account using direct debit or BPay.
